description: This file implements an OAuth callback page component that handles the redirect flow from third-party OAuth providers. It processes URL search parameters, communicates with the backend API to complete the OAuth process, displays status messages and icons, and redirects upon success.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackContent
methods.description: React component that handles OAuth callback processing and UI rendering based on the OAuth state and response.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Default export: React component that wraps OAuthCallbackContent within a Suspense boundary.
